body: Your organization is rewarded handsomely for its recent efforts, either with payment from a grateful employer or rich spoils from looting an enemy. You gain 1d10 × 10 gp, 1d6 points of Goods, and 1 point of Magic.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Downtime Events/Organization Events/Mercenary Company Events/Windfall
name: Windfall
